exceptions.exn: In environment plus_cancel_l' := plus_cancel_l : forall a b c : nat, a + b = a + c -> b = c n' : nat f, g : nat -> nat H : forall i : nat, i < S n' -> f i <= g i IHn' : (forall i : nat, i < n' -> f i <= g i) -> ∑ n' f <= ∑ n' g Unable to unify "?M1463 = ?M1464" with "f 0 + ∑ n' (fun n : nat => f (S n)) <= g 0 + ∑ n' (fun n : nat => g (S n))".

In environment n' : nat f, g : nat -> nat H : f n' <= g n' IHn' : (forall i : nat, i < n' -> f i <= g i) -> ∑ n' f <= ∑ n' g Unable to unify "f n' <= g n'" with "f 0 + ∑ n' (fun n : nat => f (S n)) <= g n'".

In environment n' : nat f, g : nat -> nat H : f n' <= g n' IHn' : (forall i : nat, i < n' -> f i <= g i) -> ∑ n' f <= ∑ n' g Unable to unify "∑ n' f <= ∑ n' g" with "f 0 + ∑ n' (fun n : nat => f (S n)) <= g n'".

original: intros H. induction n as [| n' IHn']. -- simpl. auto. -- simpl. apply plus_cancel_l'. specialize (H n' (lt_n_Sn n')). simpl in H. apply le_trans with (g n'). apply H. apply IHn'.
